characters.name: Nishikata
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4'11")

Nishikata is a middle school student in class 1-2. He sits in the back of the classroom next to [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800). He can't handle bitter things like black coffee, secretly watches/reads a romance titled "100% Unrequited Love", and gets frightened very easily. He does average academically.

characters.name: Takagi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4'11")

A middle schooler​ at an unnamed school. She sits at the back of class 1-2 next to [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799). Academically talented and physically capable she claims her only weaknesses are her ticklish armpits and her inability to stop teasing Nishikata.

characters.name: Mano
characters.description:
Mano is [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata)'s and [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800/Takagi)'s classmates and has an undisclosed relationship with [Nakai](https://anilist.co/character/128607/Nakai). 

Mano is generally shy, anxious, and sheepish towards other people, especially when she is trying to talk to Nakai. She also has noticeable anger issues, as she quickly becomes impatient when bothered or pestered by others. Regarding her relationship with Nakai, she often second-guesses herself while trying to interact with him. She wishes that Nakai would show more interest in the relationship, but loves him regardless. They are seen happily watching the fireworks together at the summer festival, showing that the two are able to enjoy each other's presence despite their issues with each other.

characters.name: Nakai
characters.description:
One of the classmates of [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata) and [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800/Takagi) and the boyfriend of [Mano](https://anilist.co/character/128606/Mano). 

Nakai has a very calm, friendly and laid-back demeanor who enjoys hanging out with his male friends more than he does with Mano. He explains that it's hard for him to hang out with Mano, although he still greatly cares for her.

characters.name: Mina Hibino
characters.description: Mina is an energetic, bubbly girl and always cheerful in the group. She is very playful at all times and always noisy. Mina also is bad at running and gets tired easily, such as when she was excited for the school marathon, yet got tired at the start.

characters.name: Tanabe-sensei
characters.description:
Mr. Tanabe is the homeroom teacher of class 1-2, in which [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800/Takagi), [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata), [Mano](https://anilist.co/character/128606/Mano), [Nakai](https://anilist.co/character/128607/Nakai), [Sanae](https://anilist.co/character/128611/Sanae-Tsukimoto), [Mina](https://anilist.co/character/128608/Mina-Hibino) and [Yukari](https://anilist.co/character/128614/Yukari-Tenkawa) are a part of.

~!He later proposes to Tsukimoto-sensei.!~

characters.name: Sanae Tsukimoto
characters.description:
Sanae Tsukimoto is one of [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata)'s and [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800/Takagi)'s classmates and a close friend of [Mina](https://anilist.co/character/128608/Mina-Hibino) and [Yukari](https://anilist.co/character/128614/Yukari-Tenkawa).

Sanae is a very blunt, yet caring and intelligent girl. Known for always having a very stoic expression and demeanor, Sanae likes to keep to herself. She is extremely athletic and is particularly adept at running and swimming. Underneath her typically expressionless exterior, Sanae is shown to care greatly for her two closest friends, Mina and Yukari. The three girls are constantly seen together, both in and out of school. Sanae may have a soft spot for animals. In one instance, Sanae was chasing a cat that had taken Yukari's snack. However, upon realizing that the cat had taken the snack in order to feed its kittens, Sanae decided to let the feline keep the stolen snack.

characters.name: Hamaguchi
characters.description: Hamaguchi is one of [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata)'s friend. He seems to be interested in [Houjou](https://anilist.co/character/163024/Houjou).

characters.name: Houjou
characters.description:
Houjou is a student who shares the same class as [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800/Takagi) and [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata). She has a mature personality which contrasts with her classmates. Every time she sees someone immature, she would say how immature of them.

Despite her maturity, she is often endeared by [Hamaguchi](https://anilist.co/character/163023/Hamaguchi)'s clumsy personality.

characters.name: Sumire Takagawa
characters.description: Sumire Takagawa is one of [Takagi](https://anilist.co/character/120800/Takagi)'s and [Nishikata](https://anilist.co/character/120799/Nishikata)'s classmates. She is a close friend of Takagi.

characters.name: Tsukimoto-sensei
characters.description:
Sanae Tsukimoto's older sister.

~!She is later proposed by Tanabe-sensei.!~
